title: Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information-Can't get it fixed
body:
I've been playing league for 2 years now but 2 months ago i got the error in patch 6.20 and I havent been able to play  the game since then.I tried a lot of things(keep in mind im using windows 7 at the moment):

-reinstalling hte game
-using Hextech Repair Tool
-turning off antiviruses and firewall
-changing internet connections
-switching to a wired internet connection
-deleting several files(from these files or even deleting these projects,lol_air_client,lol_patcher,etc)
-replacing several files(from the ones listed above)
-running game as administrator
-repatching
-repairing the client

Does anyone have any suggestions on what else i should try?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Has [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) helped resolve your issue, as suggested by a user below.
TY SO MCH DUDE SO SO BAY

Yeah same thing, fixed it by changing my DNS to 8.8.8.8,
however game crashed at first load-in and would not reconnect.

Now the client's detected possible corruption and is downloading 4gb of patches.

Hurray! 3 Hours!
I have basically the same problem as u but im running windows 10
